h1.span: Holdrege Public School Closure Extended Through April 30th

div.p: Based on recommendations from the Commissioner of Education, the Governor, and Two Rivers Public Health Department, Holdrege Public Schools will be continuing to haveÂ its buildings closedÂ through April 30th.Â Our buildings are closed, but the school year is not over.Â See attachments for the official letter from Mr. Hilyard and from Two Rivers Public Health Department.

a.h3: Changes to our School Lunch Distribution, Starting April 2nd
